ARABIC: وَزَكَرِيَّا وَيَحْيَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰ وَإِلْيَاسَ كُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And Zakariyya, Yahya, 'Isa and llyas. All of them were among the salihun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Zachariah and John We guided, and guided Jesus and Elias who were all among the upright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (And of his descendants We guided) Zakariya (Zachariah), Yahya (John), Isa (Jesus) and Ilyas (Elias): each one of them was of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We also gave guidance to Zacharias, John, Jesus, and Elias, who were all pious people,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And (We guided) Zakaria and Yahya (John) and Eisa and Elias; all these are worthy of Our proximity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And Zakariyya, and Yahya and `Isa and Iliyas, each one of them was of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Zakariya and Yahya and Isa and Ilyas; every one was of the good;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Zachariah and John, Jesus and Elias; each was of the righteous;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And Zachariah and John and Jesus and Elias. Each one (of them) was of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Zachariah, John, Jesus, and Elijah, every one of them was righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And also Zakariyya and Yahya and Isa and llyas: each one was of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and Zechariah, John, Jesus and Ilyas—each of them among the righteous—
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And Zakariya and John, and Jesus and Elias: all in the ranks of the righteous:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And Zakariya (Zachariya), and Yahya (John) and 'Iesa (Jesus) and Iliyas (Elias), each one of them was of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and (Prophets) Zachariah, John, Jesus and Elias, each was of the righteous,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Zechariah, and John, and Jesus, and Elias—every one of them was of the upright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And Zechariah and John and Jesus and Elias - and all were of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [6:85] And Zachariah and, his son, John, and Jesus, son of Mary — this shows that [the term] ‘seed’ (dhurriyya) can include offspring from the female [side] — and Elias, the paternal nephew of Aaron, brother of Moses; all, of them, were of the righteous.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And Zachariah and John and Jesus and Elias. Each one (of them)) We guided by bestowing upon them prophethood and Islam; and all of them were of the seed of Abraham (was of the righteous) i.e. they were messengers.
